Chang-Roberts algorithm for leader election in a ring

An early algorithm for electing a leader in a unidirectional ring appeared as

E. Chang, R. Roberts: An improved algorithm for decentralized extrema-finding in circular configurations of processes. CACM 22(5): 281-283, 1979.

The module contains a PlusCal version of that algorithm. For verifying it, create an instance such as

N <- 6

Id <- «27, 4, 42, 15, 63, 9»

and check the invariants TypeOK and Correctness and the temporal logic property Liveness.
